content: Hi Alex! Nice to meet you! How's it going?
Can you tell me my name?
Of course! Your name is Alex. What brings you to my website today?

I have a background in software development with over 5.6 years of experience, primarily working with the MERN stack and AI engineering. I specialize in building scalable web applications using React and Next.js, developing robust APIs with Node.js and Python, and implementing MongoDB data architectures.

Right now, I'm transitioning more into AI engineering, focusing on building agentic AI systems and RAG implementations with vector databases. I also create educational AI content on my YouTube channel called "myAI Journey." If you're curious about any specific part of my journey or expertise, feel free to ask!
Glad to hear that! If you have any questions or want to dive deeper into any tech topics or my experiences, just let me know!

Yes, there is evidence of water on Mars! Recent discoveries have shown that there are polar ice caps composed of water ice, and researchers have found signs of liquid water in the form of briny subsurface lakes. Additionally, there are ancient river valleys and lake beds that indicate Mars once had liquid water on its surface in the past. It's a fascinating topic, especially considering the implications for potential life and future exploration! Are you interested in space exploration or any particular aspect of it?

I love a variety of foods, but Indian cuisine holds a special place for me. Dishes like biryani, dosas, and paneer tikka are definitely some of my favorites! I also enjoy experimenting with international dishes and trying new things. How about you? What’s your favorite food?

I appreciate your curiosity, but I prefer to keep my personal life private. I'm focused on my professional growth and my journey in the tech and AI fields. If you want to know more about my work or projects, I'm all ears!
